div.ab:
طلبت أن
يدفع إلي الدّينارين الّتي للجامع عن
حلش حكر العريشة للكرم الكرم فوعدني
إلى يوم الأربعا فأرسلت إليه
فأعاد إلي رسالة لا تصلح وأنت
أعزّك اللّه أولا من عاون بالواجب
عليك ما على للحامع ڤڤد حصل علپپا
دين لصالح ورسم الكرم في الحكم
عين رسم القديم لأنّه يودى حق
متقدّم فاعلم ذلك وتعمل في ذلك
تحسن تحسن به الذّكر حسب عوائدك الجميلة
إن شا اللّه

*** *** *** *** ṭalabtu ʾan
yadfaʿa ʾilay ya ăd dīnārayni ăllatī li l ǧāmiʿi ʿan
ḥalši ḥikri ăl ʿarīšaẗi li ø l ăl karmi fa waʿada nī
ʾilà yawmi ăl ʾarbaʿāʾi fa ʾarsaltu ʾilay hi
fa ʾaʿāda ʾilay ya risālaẗ:an lā taṣlaḥu wa ʾanta
ʾaʿazza ka ăl lāhu ʾawlā man ʿāwana bi ăl wāǧibi
ʿalay ka ø ʿalà mā li l ǧāmiʿi fa qad ḥaṣala ʿalay nā
dayn:un li ṣāliḥ:in wa rasmu ăl karmi fī ăl ḥukmi
ʿaynu rasmi ăl qadīmi liʾanna hu yuʾaddī ḥaqq
mutaqaddim fa ĭʿlam ḏālika wa taʿmal fī ḏālika
tuḥsinu yaḥsunu bi hi ăḏ ḏikra ḏikru ḥasaba ʿawāʾidi ka ăl ǧamīlaẗi
ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu

.................... I demanded that
... für den he should pay me the two dînârs, which are due to the great mosque for
Pachtzins des Weingartens. ... pruning the vine-arbour of the vine(yard). Now he promised to pay me
by Wednesday. So I sent to him,
... Aber Du but he repeated a message to me, which was not suitable, while you -
- Gott stärke Dich- bist derjenige, dem es auf Grund der dir obliegenden Pflicht am ehesten zukommt, may God exalt you - are the best assistant respecting that which is obligatory
upon you and due to the great mosque. There is already a debt incumbent upon us zu dem, was der Moschee zukommt, zu verhelfen. ...
... Die Gebühr des Weinbergs ist, wie üblich (?), to the credit of Ṣâliḥ, and the tax on the vines is, according to the rule,
identisch mit der alten Gebühr, denn er zahlt eine the same as the old tax; for he pays (only) a former.
duty (fee). Now take note of it, and act in this matter, vorhergenende (d.h. bereits früher bestehende) Abgabe. ...
dunning him discreetly in accordance with your graceful habits,
if God wills.
